alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 06 at 2:41PM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...El Paso, Pueblo, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
